confidence.q: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
With confidence, you have won before you have started.

excellence.q: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

inspiration.q: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

success.q: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

time.q: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you’re the pilot.
Time isn’t the main thing. It’s the only thing.
